Being physically active improves pain , mobility quality life people live knee OA ; however , less half patient active . Combining best evidence OA care digital technology , investigator propose new model care improve physical activity patient OA . The investigator primary objective determine feasibility preliminary efficacy multi-component model care involve 1 ) group education structure goal-setting session , 2 ) use Fitbit Flex ( commercially available physical activity tracker ) 3 ) weekly telephone activity counsel physiotherapist improve physical activity reduce sedentary time patient knee OA . Have previous diagnosis rheumatoid arthritis , psoriatic arthritis , ankylose spondylitis , polymyalgia rheumatica , connective tissue disease , fibromyalgia gout . Have history use diseasemodifying antirheumatic drug gout medication . Have prior knee replacement surgery , wait list total knee replacement surgery . Have history acute injury knee past 6 month . Have surgery back , hip , knee , foot ankle joint past 12 month . Have email address daily access computer internet connection . Be able attend 2hour education session Mary Pack Arthritis Centre .
